name: My Amazing Tomato Basil Soup (Like Applebee's®)
author: lainalee
summary: This tastes just like the tomato basil soup they serve at Applebee's®. The hubs loved it so that's saying something! I always add a pinch of sugar to tomato-based sauce, but I'm not sure that it needed it. Served it with baked fries with seasoned salt and grilled gouda cheese sandwiches on thick crusty bread, panini-style.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano, or to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil, or more to taste
6  Italian-style seasoned croutons, or as needed
directions: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Saute garlic in hot oil until tender and fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes
Stir Stir condensed tomato soup and marinara sauce into garlic; slowly add water
Mix oregano and black pepper into soup; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to low, and cook until flavors blend, about 15 minutes
Ladle into bowls and top with croutons and Parmesan cheese
